====Usage notes====
{{lang|ja|俺／おれ}} is the usual casual form used by men, and is completely acceptable with friends; {{ja-l|僕}} or {{ja-l|私}} are too formal for casual use. Conversely, in polite conversation or where polite forms are expected, {{lang|ja|俺}} is unacceptable and rude. As with other casual forms, may be used intentionally if one wishes to be rude, but should not be used otherwise.
